article_title: Kentucky set to license pastoral counselors to provide faith-based mental health services
article_text: Beginning Tuesday, the state will start licensing professional mental and behavioral health counselors in Kentucky who also are pastors. They will be called Kentucky licensed pastoral counselors and their work will be covered by insurance policies for those who desire faith-based mental health services.

They will be called Kentucky licensed pastoral counselors and their work will be covered by insurance policies for those who desire faith-based mental health services.
